subject: Biathlon
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: If you want to keep an image in your mind of how Ole Einar Bjorndalen became the most decorated Winter Olympian in history, it is best to see him skiing solo: through the woods, through the years.
snippet: If you want to keep an image in your mind of how Ole Einar Bjorndalen became the most decorated Winter Olympian in history, it is best to see him skiing solo: through the woods, through the years.
